mapper.select: select max(sq_all_number) from cp_sq where sq_dtime like '${current_year}%'
select max(sq_number) from cp_sq where sq_dtime like '${current_year}%' and model_id = ${model_id}
select sq_id,sq_realname,model_id,sq_dtime,sq_title2,submit_name,sq_status,hits,day_hits,week_hits,month_hits,lasthit_dtime,query_code,sq_code from cp_sq where me_id = #{me_id} order by sq_id desc
select count(sq_id) from cp_sq where sq_flag in (0,1,2) and publish_status = 1 and is_open = 1 ${con}
select * from cp_sq_custom where sq_id = #{sq_id}
select cu_value from cp_sq_custom where sq_id = #{sq_id} and cu_key = #{cu_key}
select sq_id,model_id from cp_sq where query_code = #{query_code} and sq_code = #{sq_code}

select sq_id,model_id,sq_dtime,time_limit from cp_sq
where sq_status < 3 and (timeout_flag = 0 or (timeout_flag = 1 and alarm_flag < 3))
order by sq_id desc
select * from cp_sq where sq_id = #{sq_id}
mapper.delete: delete from cp_sq_custom where model_id in (${model_ids})
mapper.update: update cp_sq set sq_title2 = #{sq_title2}, sq_content2=#{sq_content2}, is_open=#{is_open}, area_id=#{area_id}, cat_id=#{cat_id}, pur_id=#{pur_id}, publish_status=#{publish_status}, submit_name=#{submit_name}, do_dept=#{do_dept}, weight=#{weight} where sq_id = #{sq_id}
mapper.insert: update cp_sq_custom set cu_value = #{cu_value} where cu_id = #{cu_id} and cu_key = #{cu_key}
mapper.update: update cp_sq set hits = hits+1,day_hits = day_hits+1,week_hits = week_hits+1,month_hits = month_hits+1,lasthit_dtime=#{lasthit_dtime} where sq_id = #{sq_id}
update cp_sq set is_back = #{is_back} where sq_id = #{sq_id}
update cp_sq set sq_status = '-99' where sq_id in (${sq_ids})
update cp_sq set sq_status = '-99' where model_id in (${model_ids})
mapper.delete: delete from cp_process where sq_id in (select sq_id from cp_sq where model_id in (${model_ids}))
delete from cp_sq_attachment where sq_id in (select sq_id from cp_sq where model_id in (${model_ids}))
delete from cp_sq_tag where sq_id in (select sq_id from cp_sq where model_id in (${model_ids}))
mapper.select: select sq_id,model_id from cp_sq where sq_dtime like '${c_year}%'
mapper.update: update cp_sq set sq_all_number = ${sq_all_number},sq_number=${sq_number} where sq_id = ${sq_id}
mapper.select: select * from cp_process where sq_id = #{sq_id} order by pro_id
select * from cp_process where pro_id = (select max(pro_id) from cp_process where sq_id = #{sq_id})
mapper.delete: delete from cp_process where sq_id in (${sq_id})
mapper.select: select tag_id,tag_name from cs_info_tags where tag_id in (select tag_id from cp_sq_tag where sq_id = #{sq_id})
mapper.insert: delete from cp_sq_tag where sq_id in (${sq_ids})
mapper.select: select * from cp_sq_attachment where sq_id in (${sq_ids}) and relevance_type = #{relevance_type}
mapper.delete: delete from cp_sq_attachment where sq_id in (${sq_ids}) and relevance_type = #{relevance_type}
mapper.select: select from cp_sq order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select top ${page_size} from cp_sq
and sq_id not in (select top ${start_num} sq_id from cp_sq order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type} ) order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type}
select from cp_sq cs,cp_process cp order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select top ${page_size} from cp_sq cs,cp_process cp
and sq_id not in (select top ${start_num} sq_id from cp_sq cs,cp_process cp order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type} ) order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type}
select * from cp_sq order by sq_id desc limit 0,10

select top ${page_size} * from cp_sq
and sq_id not in (select top ${start_num} sq_id from cp_sq order by sq_id desc ) order by sq_id desc
